Text: Upcoming ORNE eventsPST I want to remind everyone that the deadline for purchasing tickets for the Winterhawks hockey night for Oregonians for Nebraska is fast approaching We have a block of tickets reserved for Sunday February th pm at Memorial Coliseum Get your checks per ticket and payable to Oregonians for Nebraska to Lisa Martin at S Everest Road Newberg OR If you have questions you can contact her at We must have your check prior to February th In other upcoming events the Oregonians for Nebraska rd Annual Founders Day celebration is scheduled for Saturday March th The festivities will kickoff with an exclusive social hour for Blackshirt Club members only from to pm A social hour with a no host bar including a silent auction for all others will start at with dinner served at pm Throughout the evening there will be door prizes and an exclusive raffle for those attending who are Alumni Association members The event is taking place at McMenamins Edgefield Manor in Troutdale Edgefield is a unique Europeanstyle village which includes lodging a pub with a movie theater fine dining a winery a brewery distillery golf course gardens vineyards artwork meeting wedding and banquet space and special events year round Edgefield built in served for several decades as the Multnomah County Poor Farm Residents operated a selfsufficient environment raising hogs poultry growing a variety of fruits and vegetables operating a dairy cannery and meat packing plant as well as working in the laundry kitchen and hospital In it was renamed the Multnomah County Home and Farm and in the late fifties the farm operation was eliminated In the facitity was renamed Edgefield Manor and for the last two decades of operation functioned as a nursing home and eventually closed in McMenamins purchased the property from Multnomah County in In phases lasting over four years the condemned buildings and land were transformed into a place that is quite special Edgefield also offers over bed and breakfast rooms creating a unique lodging experience Spacious rooms are furnished with cozy and inviting decor from the turn of the century Televisions and telephones are absent from the rooms encouraging a tranquil retreat atmosphere If you are interested in spending the night on the th contact Edgefield directly at Be sure to mention that you are with the Oregonians for Nebraska for discounted room rates Our speakers this year include the dean of the Nebraska football coaching staff George Darlington and Chancellor of the University Harvey Perlman Coach Darlington is the only remaining member of Tom Osbornes original Husker staff Darlington is just finished his th season with the Huskers and his th as Nebraskas secondary coach Darlington originally tutored the defensive ends for seasons Chancellor Perlman took over the reins of the University in Come hear about the future of both the University and the football team The theme of this years Founders Day is The Road to Number One The Alumni Association is hoping with your help to become the number one alumni association in the country You can help by joining the Alumni Association contact them at wwwunledualumni When joining be sure to use our chapter code ORE If you have questions about Founders Day or want to make a reservation the deadline is Friday March st but space is limited contact Amy Dougherty at or at If you have questions on joining the Alumni Association our local chapter or the Blackshirts Club feel free to contact me at this email address or check out our website at wwwornecom Thanks and GO BIG RED

ORNE Night at Winterhawks Hockey Cc PST ORNE Night at the WinterHawks Top reasons to clear your evening on Sunday Feb pm and be at Memorial Coliseum You want an excuse to go to a hockey game You want to go with people you know youll have fun with You want to bring along additional people so we can have at least people and get an official Winter Hawks hockey puckto be utilized at a future event like the Colorado game You know far enough in advance to actually be ABLE to clear your evening Well get to see our name up in lights The opposing team is TriCities an apparently very physical rival Were NOT going on the same night as the church groups and cub scout troops Tickets are only per person and the theme is Dream Vacation If its a raving success well go back for their Big XII night on March with a pregame banquet to schmooze with other Alumni groups And the reason to go to the game is We can still wear our Husker red since they were smart enough to make the WinterHawk colors red white and black GO BIG RED If you have any questions feel free to email Lisa Martin at or call at Send your check per ticket payable to Oregonians for Nebraska to Lisa at S Everest Road Newberg OR We must have your check prior to February th Hope to see you then and GO BIG RED
